comments.body: `a windowed` -> is this an appropriate description? This this case, it might a window over multiple streams in contrast to a single stream groupBy/windowedBy? (If we think it's ok as phrases, I am also happy with it -- just asking)
would it be better to say a window over many streams or a step before a windowed table?
Frankly, not sure... Guess it's good enough to leave as-is.
